Chapters.Title: Lucy is Jealous of a Girl Singer

Item.Title: The Red Skelton Show (Clip)
Item.Description: I Love Lucy-inspired merchandise continued to flood the market during the spring of 1953, with bedroom furniture similar to Lucy and Ricky's "bookcase bed" being particularly popular. On May 3 of that year, the Arnazes' buddy Red Skelton presented a satirical sketch on his Sunday-night comedy series poking fun at fans' insatiable appetite for "all things Lucy."

Item.Title: Spanish Main Title
Item.Description: Over the years, I Love Lucy has been translated into many different languages and syndicated all over the world. We recently discovered a print of "Lucy Hires a Maid" that included opening titles in Spanish.
